Brockton.Abington (MBTA station): Abington is a commuter rail station on the MBTA Commuter Rail Plymouth/Kingston Line, located off Center Avenue (MA 123) in Abington, Massachusetts. It serves as a park and ride stop for the towns of Abington, Rockland, and Hanover. The station opened along with the rest of the Old Colony Lines on September 29, 1997.
